instructions: Tap the Home tab, then tap the Add button . Tap Add Accessory, then follow the onscreen instructions. When you add an accessory, it s assigned to a default room, or a room you choose.

Tap Rooms, tap the Show Rooms button , then choose the room the accessory is currently assigned to. If it s not already assigned, look in Default Room. Touch and hold the accessory s button, then swipe up on the screen or tap the Settings button . Tap Room, then choose a room. Turn on Include in Favorites to add the accessory to the Home tab. To rearrange your favorites, tap the Home tab, tap Edit, then drag the buttons into the arrangement you want.
Tap Rooms, then tap the Show Rooms button . Tap Room Settings, then tap a room. Tap Zone, then tap an existing zone, or tap Create New to add the room to a new zone.
Tap Rooms, then tap the Show Rooms button . Tap Room Settings, then tap a room.
